ygData.subject: Activating MirrorWriterProcessor module via the WebUI in Heritrix 2.0
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Anyone knows if there is a way to do it ? Using Heritrix 1.x, this is pretty straightforward, but with 2.0 I could not figure how. Any pointers
